toolclip.title: Retime Forward
toolclip.text: Moves the selected Blue Pencil frames ahead on the Time Slider by the amount set in the Frame Range field.

resourcelist.video: Move Blue Pencil frames forward on the Time Slider
Select Blue Pencil frames on the Time Slider

toolclip.title: Retime Backward
toolclip.text: Moves the selected Blue Pencil frames back on the Time Slider by the amount set in the Frame Range field.

resourcelist.video: Move Blue Pencil frames backward on the Time Slider
Select Blue Pencil frames on the Time Slider

toolclip.title: Add Frame
toolclip.text: Inserts a blank frame at the current time. A frame is also created when you start drawing.

resourcelist.video: Select Blue Pencil frames on the Time Slider

toolclip.title: Clear Frame
toolclip.text: Empties the selected frame of drawings, but does not delete it.

resourcelist.video: Select Blue Pencil frames on the Time Slider

toolclip.title: Delete Frame
toolclip.text: Removes one or more selected frames at the current time.

toolclip.title: Duplicate Previous Frame
toolclip.text: Creates an identical version of the previous frame at the current time.

resourcelist.video: Select Blue Pencil frames on the Time Slider

toolclip.title: Cut Frame
toolclip.text: Removes one or more selected frames at the current time and copies it to the clipboard.

resourcelist.video: Select Blue Pencil frames on the Time Slider

toolclip.title: Copy Frame
toolclip.text: Copies the selected frame to the clipboard.

resourcelist.video: Select Blue Pencil frames on the Time Slider

toolclip.title: Paste Frame
toolclip.text: Pastes the contents of the clipboard at the current time.

resourcelist.video: Select Blue Pencil frames on the Time Slider

toolclip.title: Jump To Previous Frame
toolclip.text: Moves the selection to the frame before.

resourcelist.video: Jump to the previous Blue Pencil Frame
Select Blue Pencil frames on the Time Slider

toolclip.title: Jump To Next Frame
toolclip.text: Moves the selection to the following frame.

toolclip.title: Import Blue Pencil Frames
toolclip.text: Opens .zip archives and adds the frames to the current scene.

toolclip.text: Saves the Scene's Blue Pencil frames as a .zip archive.
